item.title: Hello Hello World
item.description: Welcome to my webiste. I’m Bastien Boutonnet, a senior data scientist at TripActions and an Amsterdam resident. I like to write and maintain open-source projects, which I mostly do under the bitpicky umbrella. When I don’t write code, I produce music under several aliases one of which is accuraat and play other people’s music to dancing people in clubs (well, before there was a pandemic that is). THE SOCIALS Twitter: @B_superhero Sometimes I tweet interesting stuff GitHub: @bastienboutonnet For my personal projects.
